title: KUT from the Kloth Women's Kelsey High-Rise Fab Ab Ankle Flare Inset Leg in Royal
description: CURVES ON DISPLAY: The KUT from the Kloth Kelsey High-Rise Fab AB Ankle Flare Inset Leg in Royal jeans is designed to highlight your natural curves while providing a comfortable and flattering fit. This high-rise style sits beautifully at your waist, offering an elongated and elegant silhouette. These ankle length jeans for women have been meticulously tailored to complement your figure, making them the go-to choice for enhancing your confidence and style on various occasions.

VERSATILE DETAILING: These flared jeans for women come with an array of versatile features. Waist loops make accessorizing with your favorite belts a breeze, allowing you to elevate your outfits effortlessly. The zip-fly and button closure ensure a secure and comfortable fit, while the classic five-pocket construction provides the convenience of traditional jean styling. The classic rivet detailing adds a touch of authenticity to your denim look.

FRONT TO BACK STYLE: These high-rise jeans for women are the perfect balance of style and practicality. They feature both coin and hand pockets on the front for easy access to your essentials, along with patch pockets on the back, offering additional storage and a classic jean look. From your phone to your keys, these pockets provide ample space for your daily necessities.

ANKLE FLARE: A distinct feature of these women’s flare jeans is the ankle flare design. This fashionable element adds a touch of flair and retro-inspired style to your outfits. The flattering flare complements various footwear options, from stylish heels to your favorite sneakers, allowing you to create a variety of looks for different occasions. Express your unique fashion sense with these versatile jeans.

PREMIUM MATERIALS: Crafted from a blend of 89% cotton, 10% polyester, and 1% spandex, these retro jeans for women combine comfort and durability. The materials provide a soft and luxurious feel against your skin, ensuring all-day comfort and a premium fit. They are built to withstand your everyday activities and offer the perfect amount of stretch for freedom of movement. Easy to care for, they are machine washable, making them a convenient addition to your everyday wardrobe.

LAID-BACK WITH THE PERFECT AMOUNT OF EDGE, THE KELSEY IS CROPPED WITH JUST THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF FLARE. The kelsey is fitted through the hips and thighs and finishes off with a cropped kick flare for a modern take on the classic silhouette.
